articles.author: Chris Isidore
articles.title: Teamsters plan strike at Costco on February 1 - CNN
articles.description: Members of the Teamsters union have authorized a strike against Costco on February 1 unless they reach a deal with the warehouse retailer before the current contract expires on January 31.
articles.content:

articles.title: Eating this breakfast food could help you live longer, study suggests - AOL
articles.description: Could eating oatmeal help people live longer? Fox News Digital spoke with two health experts about a recent study linking the regular consumption of oatmeal to longevity.

articles.description: Tanzania's president says she is "confident" the country will "overcome" the highly infectious Marburg.
articles.content:
Tanzania's president has announced an outbreak of Marburg virus, an Ebola-like virus, just a week after her health minister denied that there were any cases in the country.
